text: Mariusz Śrutwa (born 15 July 1971 in Bytom) is a former Polish footballer who played as a striker. ==External links== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Poland international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Polonia Bytom players Category:Ruch Chorzów players Category:Legia Warsaw players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Sportspeople from Bytom
title: Mariusz Śrutwa
